text:
Hey all - *We're hiring*
We have a fully remote Web Developer position available with us, working as part of our Brand and Creative team. Our site is currently in HubSpot, which is where you'll begin, but the ideal candidate will be working closely with us to develop our site in future, and integrate with our platform.
Full job spec and application info can be found here on our careers site:
<https://careers.capdesk.com/jobs/1097758-web-developer>
